author: rooneg
msg: Merge r373453 into 0.9.x, with necessary changes to tests to account for
Fix bug #38438, seeks are broken for files opened for append in xthread
Submitted by: M Joonas Pihlaja <jpihlaja cc.helsinki.fi>
(apr_file_seek): Fix APR_END case of APR_XTHREAD case.

author: mrglavas
msg: Repairing the warn-on-undeclared-elemdef feature which has been broken for
many releases. When this feature is enabled, a warning is reported if an
element referenced in a content model is not declared.
